title: OCR on Tickets
description: OCR on Tickets focuses on developing a multi-LLM chatbot solution that extracts and processes information from handwritten tickets using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. Leveraging OpenAI Vision for image-to-text conversion, the system decodes and interprets handwritten content with high accuracy. By integrating Generative AI and Prompt Engineering, the solution enhances data extraction and automates workflows. The FastAPI framework ensures efficient backend processing, while Base64 is utilized for secure image handling.

title: United Healthcare

The system features efficient data warehousing, optimized data management, automated report generation, and significantly faster database operations. The impact includes streamlined user onboarding through automated NID verification, improving accessibility and usability for end users.

title: Unitronic
description: Unitronic aimed to enhance operational efficiency for Unitronics, a provider of high-quality medical equipment servicing across the Nordics and Europe. The solution centralized data from Microsoft Field Service and APIs using Azure Data Factory and Azure SQL. Power BI dashboards were developed to track key metrics such as utilization, hours per HQE, and revenue per hour. The system optimized resource allocation based on location and service demands, providing real-time insights for proactive decision-making and ensuring consistent service quality across regions.

title: Augustus
description: Augustus developed a scalable data solution for Augustus, a USA-based company focused on urbanization improvement. The system collects and processes heterogeneous surveillance data in both bulk and real-time. Utilizing AWS services such as AWS Data Lake, AWS Glue, and Lambda, the solution ensures efficient data storage, ETL processes, and real-time processing. The application, built with .NET and Angular, includes features like real-time surveillance, aerial data insights, bulk data processing, and data warehouse management, enabling comprehensive urban data analysis.
